node_editor.node_graphics_view module¶

class node_editor.node_graphics_view.ViewMode(value)¶

Bases: enum.IntEnum

Mode representing when we reroute existing edge ctrl + click

NOOP = 1¶
EDGE_DRAG = 2¶
EDGE_CUT = 3¶
EDGES_REROUTING = 4¶
SCENE_DRAG = 5¶
class node_editor.node_graphics_view.NodeGraphicsView(scene: node_editor.node_scene.Scene, parent=None)¶

Bases: PyQt5.QtWidgets.QGraphicsView

Implement custom graphics view that holds the scene containing a background and the nodes. Holds most key, mouse events.

Parameters

  • scene (Scene) – reference to the Scene

  • parent (QWidget) – parent widget

  • Attributes (Instance) –

  • ------------------- –

:param - grScene - reference to the GraphicsScene: :param - mode - state of the Graphics View: :param - zoomInFactor- float - zoom step scaling: :param default 1.25: :param - zoomClamp - bool - do we clamp zooming or is it infinite?: :param - zoom - current zoom step: :param - zoomStep - int - the relative zoom step when zooming in/out: :param - zoomRange - [min: :param max]:

mousePressEvent(event: PyQt5.QtGui.QMouseEvent) → None¶

Redirect click events according to the button pressed

mouseReleaseEvent(event: PyQt5.QtGui.QMouseEvent) → None¶

Redirect release events according to the button released

leftMouseButtonPress(event: PyQt5.QtGui.QMouseEvent)¶

Handle left mouse button click

Change the current mode depending on which item is clicked on :

  • Node or Edge + shift : add to selection

  • Socket : Edge dragging or rerouting mode

  • `Scene’ + ctrl : Edge cutting mode

Parameters

event (QMouseEvent) –

leftMouseButtonRelease(event)¶

Handle left mouse button is released

End dragging or rerouting mode :param event: :type event: QMouseEvent

Implement dragging of the scene using middle button

distanceBetweenClickAndRelease(event: PyQt5.QtGui.QMouseEvent)¶

Measures if we are too far from the last LMB click scene position. This is used for detection if we release too far after we clicked on a Socket

Parameters

event (QMouseEvent) –

Returns

True if we released too far from where we clicked before

Return type

bool
